Package cmpt213.assignment1.packagedeliveriestracker

Class PackageList

java.lang.Object
cmpt213.assignment1.packagedeliveriestracker.PackageList
public class PackageList extends Object
This class manages the list of packages using singleton pattern
Author:
Nhat Huy Phan (James)
